message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,500,000. I understand its significance and would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. Considering the exceptional quality and the importance this product holds for you, I propose to sell it to you at $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to ensure that you receive the best possible value while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to facilitate this transaction.
